title: Purchasing RP problem
body:
Guys i have transferred from NA to EUW and my card was working well on NA server .. after transferring i cant purchase any RP and i sent a ticket to riot support but still no answer .. i dont have also enough RP to go back to NA , any suggestions ? And did anybody had this problem before ? 

Thanks in advance

replies.body: Doh!  RP Cards are specific to the region they were purchased, so if you got it on NA then it's not usable on EUW.  If you have a ticket number, I'd be happy to check on its status.  Let me know!
